questions.answer_description:
You need to create a lead and qualify the lead.
1. Navigate to Leads.
2. Click New.
3. In the Qualify stage of the process bar, select the contact named Cat Francis. When you select an existing contact while creating a lead record, the following information is automatically populated in the Lead form: First Name, Last Name, Job Title, Business Phone, Mobile Phone and Email.
4. Click Save.
5. In the Lead record, click the Qualify button in the toolbar. This will convert the lead to an opportunity.
Reference:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/sales/create-edit-lead-sales

discussion.content:
1. Passare a Lead.
2. Fare clic su Nuovo.
3. Nella fase Qualificazione della barra del processo, selezionare il contatto denominato Cat Francis. Quando selezioni un contatto esistente durante la creazione di un record lead, le seguenti informazioni vengono automaticamente inserite nel modulo Lead: nome, cognome, qualifica professionale, telefono aziendale, telefono cellulare ed e-mail.
4. Fare clic su Salva.
5. Nel record Lead, fare clic sul pulsante Qualifica nella barra degli strumenti. Ciò convertirà il lead in un'opportunità.

questions.question_text:
SIMULATION -
Please wait while the virtual machine loads. Once loaded, you may proceed to the lab section. This may take a few minutes, and the wait time will not be deducted from your overall test time.
When the Next button is available, click it to access the lab section. In this section, you will perform a set of tasks in a live environment. While most functionality will be available to you as it would be in a live environment, some functionality (e.g., copy and paste, ability to navigate to external websites) will not be possible by design.
Scoring is based on the outcome of performing the tasks stated in the lab. In other words, it doesn't matter how you accomplish the task, if you successfully perform it, you will earn credit for that task.
Labs are not timed separately, and this exam may have more than one lab that you must complete. You can use as much time as you would like to complete each lab. But, you should manage your time appropriately to ensure that you are able to complete the lab(s) and all other sections of the exam in the time provided.
Please note that once you submit your work by clicking the Next button within a lab, you will NOT be able to return to the lab.
You gather information from a prospect named Cat Francis to qualify the prospect as a new sales opportunity.
You need to identify the prospect, complete all the required fields, and qualify the prospect in the sales process.
To complete this task, sign in to the Dynamics 365 portal.

HOTSPOT -
You run a sales report for Fourth Coffee named Account Overview. The following report displays:
//IMG//

Use the drop-down menus to select the answer choice that answers each question based on the information presented in the graphic.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

discussion.content: active and inactive is the state of the account. Not the type account. Correct answer should be parent. (same questions as 25)

comments.content: question 25 gives the answer as Active account

discussion.content: Where do you see that it is a parent account? Where is it visible?
Satisfaction could be blank because the resolved cases aren't closed as well no?

comments.content: You can't know an answer for a single question on exam, you get an overall score at the end.

discussion.content: Has anyone confirmed if the exam marks it correct as a parent account or an active account?

questions.answer_description:
You need to edit the Lead to Opportunity Sales Process business process flow by making the step mandatory.
1. In the site map, select Sales Settings.
2. Under Customization, select Business Process Flows.
3. Select the Lead to Opportunity Sales Process business process flow.
4. In the Develop stage of the business process flow, select the Customer Need step.
5. Tick the Required checkbox to make this step mandatory.
6. Click Save to save the changes.
Reference:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/sales-professional/customize-business-process-flows

You receive a request to prevent a salesperson from advancing an opportunity to the Propose stage of the Lead to Opportunity Sales Process until the salesperson captures the customer need.
You need to configure your environment to meet the requirement.
To complete this task, sign in to the Dynamics 365 portal.

discussion.content:
You need to change your business process Sales Process from Lead to Opportunity by making the switch mandatory.
1. Advanced Settings -> Customizations -> Customize the System -> Processes -> Lead to Opportunity Sales Process.
2. Deactivate the process to be able to perform changes.
3. In the Business Process Development phase, select the Customer Needs phase.
4. Select the Required check box to make this step mandatory.
5. Click Save to save your changes.
6. Activate the BPF.

È necessario modificare il processo aziendale Processo di vendita da lead a opportunità rendendo il passaggio obbligatorio.
1. Nella mappa del sito, seleziona Impostazioni vendite.
2. In Personalizzazione selezionare Flussi dei processi aziendali.
3. Selezionare il processo aziendale Processo di vendita da lead a opportunità.
4. Nella fase Sviluppo del processo aziendale, selezionare la fase Necessità del cliente.
5. Selezionare la casella di controllo Obbligatorio per rendere obbligatorio questo passaggio.
6. Fare clic su Salva per salvare le modifiche

1. Nella mappa del sito, seleziona Opportunità.
2. Fare clic su Nuovo.
3. Nel campo Argomento, inserisci Installazione nuova finestra
4. Nel campo Contatto, seleziona Jay Orth.
5. Nel campo Account, selezionare Fabrikam West
6. Nel campo Periodo di acquisto, selezionare Questo trimestre.
7. Nel campo Importo budget, inserire $ 6.400,00
8. Fare clic su Salva per salvare il record dell'opportunità.

comments.content: When you type the amount in the Budget Amount field, the Estimated Budget in the first stage is automatically completed, like contact, account and timeframe. So the answer is correct.

discussion.content:
Number 7 should be: Est. Budget in the first Stage of the BPF (Qualify). 
Rest correct.

Scoring is based on the outcome of performing the tasks stated in the lab. In other words, it doesn't matter how you accomplish the task, if you successfully perform it, you will earn credit for that task.
Labs are not timed separately, and this exam may have more than one lab that you must complete. You can use as much time as you would like to complete each lab. You need to create a new opportunity record that contains the following information:
✑ Topic: New window installation
✑ Contact: Jay Orth
✑ Account: Fabrikam West
✑ Purchase timeframe: This quarter
✑ Estimated budget: $6,400.00
To complete this task, sign in to the Dynamics 365 portal.
questions.answer_description:
1. In the site map, select Opportunities.
2. Click New.
3. In the Topic field, enter New window installation
4. In the Contact field, select Jay Orth.
5. In the Account field, select Fabrikam West
6. In the Purchase Timeframe field, select This quarter.
7. In the Budget Amount field, enter $6,400.00
8. Click Save to save the opportunity record.
Reference:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/sales/create-edit-opportunity-sales

You need to update an opportunity to have a topic of Home Entertainment and to list that the opportunity plans to purchase from your competitor named Carter
Electronics.
To complete this task, sign in to the Dynamics 365 portal.
questions.answer_description:
1. In the site map, select Opportunities.
2. Open the opportunity record.
3. Type Home Entertainment into the Topic field.
4. Save the changes.
5. In the opportunity record, click Close as Lost.
6. In the Close Opportunity dialog box, click on the Competitor field then search for and select Carter Electronics.
7. Click OK.
Reference:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/sales/close-opportunity-won-lost-sales

discussion.content:
1. Nella mappa del sito, seleziona Opportunità.
2. Aprire il record dell'opportunità.
3. Digitare Home Entertainment nel campo Argomento.
4. Salva le modifiche.
5. Nel record dell'opportunità, fare clic su Chiudi come persa.
6. Nella finestra di dialogo Chiudi opportunità, fare clic sul campo Concorrente, quindi cercare e selezionare Carter Electronics.
7. Fare clic su OK

I guess the given answer is correct, however the scenario says "plans to purchase from Competitor". Doesn't sound like Opp is lost yet, in theory should just add Competitor to subgrid on the Opp for now. However, I imagine exam is looking for more than that, so this is just question that should be worded better.

comments.content: You are right, you only need to add the competitor to the subgrid. As he plans to.....
